message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000. I believe this is reflective of the significant return on investment you'll see.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to make a more reasonable investment. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and the market demand.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer and understand your perspective. Considering the unique value proposition of this product,  I'm proposing a price of $1,350,000. I believe this strikes a more balanced approach while still reflecting the significant benefits you'll gain.

I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking for a more reasonable price. I'm willing to pay $1,250,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value and the market demand.
